title: Opening for AI Engineer for Tax related project - 100% Remote
description:
We have an opening for AI Engineer for Tax related project

Location - Remote

Long term Contract

Required Skills & Qualifications:
Strong experience in AI agent development, multi-agent systems, or autonomous systems.
Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, AutoGen, or similar frameworks.
Understanding of LLMs, reinforcement learning, and AI reasoning/planning methods.
Experience with agentic architectures, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), or memory-based AI.
Knowledge of API integration, vector databases, and knowledge graphs is a plus.
Ability to design, train, and deploy AI agents in real-world environments.
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
Prior Experience with any complex corporate tax initiates with one of the big accounting firms would be very helpful.
